text: This article contains the results of the Tipperary Senior Hurling Team in the Championship during the 2000s. Tipperary played 48 Championship games during the decade, winning 28, losing 16 and drawing 4. They won 3 Munster titles in 2001, 2008, and 2009 and won 1 All Ireland title in 2001. ==2000== \---- \---- \---- ==2001== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==2002== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==2003== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==2004== \---- \---- \---- ==2005== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==2006== ==2007== ==2008== \---- \---- ==2009== \---- \---- \---- ==References== ==External links== *Tipperary GAA Fan site *Tipperary on Hoganstand.com *Tipperary GAA site *Premierview *Tipperary GAA Archives 2000 Category:2000 senior hurling county championships Category:2001 senior hurling county championships Category:2002 senior hurling county championships Category:2003 senior hurling county championships Category:2004 senior hurling county championships Category:2005 senior hurling county championships Category:2006 senior hurling county championships Category:2007 senior hurling county championships Category:2008 senior hurling county championships Category:2009 senior hurling county championships
title: Tipperary Senior Hurling Championship Results 2000–2009
